profession: Aspiring AI Agent Engineer | Multi-Agent Systems
heroDescription: Training towards AI agent engineering and multi-agent systems. Solid foundation in software development and systems logic.
profileText1: Systems Engineering student with a clear vision towards AI agent engineering and multi-agent system orchestration. My goal is to design and coordinate specialized autonomous agents (backend, frontend, QA, documentation) that work together to produce complete software.
profileText2: I have a foundation in software development and programming logic. Currently in active training in Python, LLMs, agent frameworks (LangChain, CrewAI, MetaGPT), and local models with Ollama. Seeking opportunities where I can apply and deepen my knowledge in applied AI.
focus: Focus on AI, autonomous agents and multi-agent systems
project1Desc: Complete system for student, course, and grade management with Java Swing graphical interface.

project3Desc: RESTful API for user management with JWT authentication, Swagger documentation, and tests.
